discourse_list.title: Council of Paris 2020 - Topics for Discussion

content.content: Today, Wed. March 4,  at EthCC Paris, we will be having our sessions in “Workshop Pontoise” on Level 5, from 1:25pm and ends 5:25pm. Come and participate! Here is the general schedule. Please reply with any topics which you want to discuss!  Introducing Operations Ring 1:25pm - 1:35pm w/ Anett Rolikova Running an Ethereum Mainnet Node 1:40pm - 2:40pm w/ Felipe Faraggi, Greg Jeanmart, William Schwab Eth1.x Stateless Ethereum Community Discussion 2:50pm - 3:50pm w/ Piper Merriam, Alexey Akhunov, James Hancock, Griffin Ichiba Hotchkiss If you have questions or comments for the Eth1.x Q&A, post them here. Magicians’ Council 4:00pm - 5:25pm w/ Jamie Pitts, Greg Colvin (video message), and of course, all of y’all!  All are welcome to participate! Come and ask questions, post to the Twitter thread, or post them here.
